advanced.d: Controls whether or not to display advanced settings and pattern options
paperless.d: Drafts a pattern with all dimensions included so you can transfer it on fabric or another medium without the need to print
sabool.d: Controls whether or not to include seam allowance in your pattern
sa.d: Controls the amount of seam allowance included in your pattern
locale.d: Determines the language used on your pattern
only.d: Allows you to control which pattern parts will be included in your pattern
units.d: Controls the units used on your pattern
margin.d: Controls the margin around pattern parts
complete.d: Controls how detailed the pattern is; Either a complete pattern with all details, or a basic outline of the pattern parts
layout.d: Controls how the individual pattern parts are placed on your pattern
debug.d: Enable debug to gain additional info about how your pattern was created
scale.d: Controls the overall line width, font size, and other elements that do not scale with the pattern's measurements
renderer.d: Controls how the pattern is rendered (drawn) on the screen
xray.d: Look under the hood with FreeSewing's X-ray mode
